label: Books on Migration: Gender, Childrens Right and Protecting the Vulnerable
description: A selection of titles on migration: gender, childrens right and protecting the vulnerable available from the European Parliament Library.

The gender of borders : embodied narratives of migration, violence and agency
Migrant homelessness and the crimmigration control system

Education for Refugees and Forced (Im)Migrants Across Time and Context.
